familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump owes $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in revolving debt to Bank of America through an unsecured line of credit incurred in 2016 at a rate of LIBOR+2.5%. She also owes $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in debt to Bank of America through a Note Payable incurred in 2015 at a rate of LIBOR+2.75%, payable on June 15, 2018.

Jared Kushner holds an unsecured line of credit worth $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in revolving debt to Bank of America. The liability was incurred in 2016 at a rate of LIBOR+2.5%. A separate debt of $1,000,001 - $5,000,000, payable June 15, 2018, was incurred in 2015 at a rate of LIBOR+2.75%. Filer holds both the line of credit and the note jointly with his father.
